text: Table 2 Topical and miscellaneous drugs used in ophthalmology Sympathomimetics: phenylephrine, epinephrine, dipivefrine, brimonidine, apraclonidine Parasympatholytics: atropine, homatropine, cyclopentolate, tropicamide Parasympathomimetics: pilocarpine, carbachol, acetylcholine Anticholinesterases: ecothiopate B-Adrenoreceptor antagonists: timolol, betaxolol, carteolol, levobunolol, metipranolol Local anaesthetics: cocaine Diuretics: acetazolamide, dorzolamide, brinzolamide Steroids Antibiotics: chloramphenicol
